```{r xaringan-themer, include=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(xaringanthemer)
# Custom theme reference: https://pkg.garrickadenbuie.com/xaringanthemer/reference/style_xaringan.html
style_xaringan(
  # fonts
  header_font_google = google_font("Quicksand", "300"),
  text_font_google   = google_font("Roboto", "300", "300i", "400", "400i"),
  code_font_google   = google_font("Source Code Pro"),
  # global
  text_color = "#1E1E24",
  link_color = "#39627F",
  background_color = "#FFF",
  # code_inline_background_color = "#ddd",
  header_h1_font_size = "2em",
  header_h2_font_size = "1.5em",
  header_h3_font_size = "1.25em",
  header_font_weight = "300",
  base_font_size = "20px",
  # title slide
  title_slide_text_color = "#1E1E24",
  title_slide_background_image = "assets/images/title-slide-background.svg",
  title_slide_background_size	= "contain",
  title_slide_background_color = "#F6F7F8",
  title_slide_background_position = "50% 60%"
)
```

```{r load-packages, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(metathis)
```

```{r meta, echo=FALSE}

meta() %>%

    description = "Slides for a Start Your Lab workshop",
  ) %>% 
  meta_name("github-repo" = "startyourlab/workshop") %>% 
  meta_social(
    title = "Slide title",
    url = "https://workshops.startyourlab.com/SLIDES-NAME",
    image = "https://workshops.startyourlab.com/SLIDES-NAME/assets/images/twitter-card.png",
    image_alt = "",
    og_type = "website",
    og_author = "Start Your Lab",
    twitter_card_type = "summary_large_image",
    twitter_creator = "@startyourlab"
  )
```
